None
Vital Signs
Prior to, q15min during and 60 minutes after Rapid Cotrimoxazole Desensitization. Then BID as per routine care
Skin Assessment
Once, prior to Rapid Cotrimoxazole Desensitization
Communication Order
During and after rapid cotrimoxazole desensitization, observe for signs of allergic reaction including anaphylaxis
Patient Education
Educate patient not to miss any doses or stop cotrimoxazole unless signs or symptoms of allergic reaction occur. If a dose is missed, the desensitization protocol may need to be started again
